questionTitle: I'm afraid I am not ___________to talk about this matter.
The children were bored ______ watching that film again and again.
Susan is very ____ of telling other people what to do.
I feel so ____ and sleepy today because I worked late last night.
He ____ defined the terms. The answer sounded ____.
She ____ adjusted the fees. She adapted ____ to any situation.
The stillness of the tomb was ____. The tomb was ____ still.
He was a very ____ person. He acted very ____.
Mike wrote too ____ on the exam. He always writes ____.
Talk ____ or don't talk at all. The music played ____.
